official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House that the executive's proposal to abolish the Federal railroad retirement system and eliminate the Railroad Retirement Board should not be enacted.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the executive proposal to abolish the Federal railroad retirement system and eliminate the Railroad Retirement Board should not be enacted.
